descriptions.content:
• དམ་ཚིག་ “Samaya” or “initiatic bond” (L), “happy coincidence”
  • བསོད་བདེ་ “Merit and happiness derived from virtue” (L), “luck”
  • སེམས་ཅན་ “Sentient being (human or animal)” (L), “animal” (In Labrang, in Amdo, this word has come to mean “all.”)
  • ང་རྒྱལ་ “Pride” (L), “aggressivity,” “pride”
